name: Dazboard - The Ultimate Dashboard UI Kit
description:
Dazboard - The Ultimate Dashboard Kit is modernly crafted Figma wireframe template with light and dark mode which can be used for:

  • Wire-framing
  • Kickstart your Dashboard project
  • Create prototypes


Fasten your workflow when creating app designs with this UI kit, no need to start your project from scratch!


This template consists of 124 design layout from 7 most popular categories and theme to make your workflow fast and seamless.


Features

  • Light and dark mode
  • Using Google font
  • 300+ Organised components
  • With Atomic Design System
  • Easily change colors with color Styleguide
  • Easily change text style with Typography Styleguide
  • Pixel perfect with soft 8 px grid
  • Exclusively made for Figma
  • Well organized layers and groups


Categories

  • Log In/ Sign Up
  • Point of Sale
  • E-commerce
  • Medical
  • Online Course
  • CMS
  • Team Management


File included

  • Figma file
  • Documentation


This a DEMO Version, Get the FULL Version at:

  • Gumroad
  • CreativeMarket


Thank you for downloading this UI Kit!
